page.title: 20Sports
page.content: Sports facilities in the area are limited to two soccer pitches, two bowling greens, an outdoor swimming pool and school facilities but the area is well served by a Rugby Club, Sports Centre and a Cricket,Hockey and Squash club in adjacent areas.The town soccer club is disbanded because a ground cannot be found.This has been the centre of argument for some time in sporting circles and the local press.At this moment local councils favour land at Greenfields as sports grounds.Other groups would prefer land at Farcroft to be developed.While the debate continues the two local adult teams play at Palethorpes Factory Ground and at the Recreation Ground in Buntingsdale Road.
